summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6125 for the improvement of 55th Avenue Northeast from 55th Place Northeast to approximately 190 feet north thereof; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85072 as amended by Ordinance No. 86120, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
